name: Spring TD
description:
Expand your forest and make the land green again!

A super basic tower defense that I made in 8 hours for the Spring 2D jam.

It's missing a lot of stuff since I kind of scraped the whole thing together last minute :S

Some Controls in case they aren't clear in-game:

Clicking "1"  allows you to place a tree(left-click to confirm the placement).
Trees cost 5 leaves (indicated top left).
Trees can only be places where there is grass.
Placing a tree expands your land(green grass) and slightly increases your leaf income.
Additionally, they can defeat enemyes traveling towards the forest "core".
You win by having 500 or more grass tiles.
You lose if you let enemies hit your core a total of 20 times.

(PS 1: The balance is really of so it should be easy to beat)
(PS 2: Yes I know that the enemies are missing a texture :D  I ran out of time :( )
